last_episode_to_air.name: Busted
last_episode_to_air.overview: Major financial woes and explosive criminal charges put DMC in danger, and cause a major dent in John's carefully constructed image.

name: Myth & Mogul: John DeLorean
overview: In the automotive world, John DeLorean rose from engineer to executive to icon. But under the hood of his self-created legend lies darkness and deceit.

episodes.name: Making of a Maverick
episodes.overview: From humble beginnings to a Hollywood lifestyle, John DeLorean climbs the ranks at General Motors before deciding to launch a dazzling car of the future.

episodes.name: Bombs, Bullets & Bullsh*t
episodes.overview: As the DeLorean Motor Company sets up production in a volatile location, the turmoil outside its walls is rivaled only by the turbulence within.

episodes.name: Busted
episodes.overview: Major financial woes and explosive criminal charges put DMC in danger, and cause a major dent in John's carefully constructed image.
